text: Orlando Alfonso García Flores (born 14 June 1965) is a Mexican politician from the National Action Party. From 2000 to 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Nuevo León. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Nuevo León Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:National Action Party (Mexico) politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: Orlando García Flores
